tog-prefershttps: Guma okozese connection etiine kabi yaba oyeyanjwiremu.
tog-fancysig: Twaara akamanyiso nka Ebigambo bya wiki( hatariho linki erikutwara aha orubaju be rwawe)
tog-requireemail: Tsindika emails z'oku setinga busya akamanyiso kokweyanjuramu haba hahirwe email address nana eiziina rya omukozesa.
tog-ccmeonemails: Ntsindikira kopi yaza emails ezinku tsindikira Abakozesa abandi
tog-enotifwatchlistpages: Ntsindikira email Orubaju rwanje ninga fayiro aha Ebirikukuratirwa byahindurwa
tog-enotifusertalkpages: Ntsindikira email iganiriro ry'orubaju rwangye rwa hinduka
tog-enotifminoredits: Ntsindikira email ahawa empindahinduka nkye eza embaju nana za fayiro
tog-enotifrevealaddr: Yoreka email address yangye omu za email z'oku kumanyisa
tog-diffonly: Ebirikukwaata aha orubaju bitorekwa aheifwe ya Entaniso
tog-showrollbackconfirmation: Yoreka okuhamya waba nonyiga aha linki eya Garuza
tog-editsectiononrightclick: Yikiriza okuhindura ekyicweka Kya Orubaju Ori kunyiga mukono buryo aha mitwe mikuru yebicweka.
tog-minordefault: Ramba empindahinduka zoona ezitari zamaani nk'oku karayekore na Karimagyezi
tog-forceeditsummary: Nyijutsya ngu natsigaho omwanya gutiine kihandikiremu ogwa ebyahindurwa omubugufu
tog-useeditwarning: Ndabura nareka Orubaju rwa empinduka nta bikire ebinahindura
tog-previewonfirst: Yoreka okubiri kushusha aha kugorora kwa okubanza
tog-previewontop: Yoreka okubiri kushusha aharuguru ya ka bokisi k'oku gorooramu
tog-uselivepreview: Yoreka nk'oku biri kushushana otagarukiremu Orubaju busya.
tog-usenewrc: Teka empindahinduka ebikozirwe Orubaju nk'ezihererukire nana ebirikukuratirwa, omu gurupu.
tog-hideminor: Shereka empindahinduka ezitari z'amaani ezirugire kukorwa
tog-newpageshidepatrolled: Shereka embaju ezi rambwirwe omu rukarara rwa embaju ensya
tog-extendwatchlist: Hangutsya Ebikukuratirirwa kworeka empindahinduka zoona, zitari ezarugaho
tog-watchlistunwatchlinks: Ramba otakuratirira/kuratirira ({{int: Ebyokukuratirira-otakuratirira}}/{{int: Ebyokukuratirira-shazamu-okutakuratirira}}) aha embaju eziri kukuratirirwa eziine empindahinduka (JavaScript neyetengesa kwenda bikorwe)
tog-watchlisthideminor: Shereka empindahinduka ezitari zamaani, obutarebwa aha Ebirikukuratirwa
tog-watchlisthidebots: Shereka empindahinduka za bot obatarebwa aha Ebirikukuratirwa
tog-watchlisthideanons: Shereka empindahinduka aza Abakozesa abatari kumanywa, obutarebwa aha Ebirikukuratirwa
tog-watchlisthideliu: Shereka empindahinduka eza Omukozesa ateyeyanjwire, obutarebwa aha Ebirikukuratirwa
tog-watchlistreloadautomatically: Ebirikukuratirwa byeyoreke busya buri obwakajejena kakuhindurwa (JavaScript neyetagisa)
tog-watchlisthidepatrolled: Shereka empindahinduka ezi rambwirwe, obutarebwa aha Ebirikukuratirwa
tog-watchdefault: Gita embaju nana fayiro ezinku tereeza, aha Ebirikukuratirwa byangye.
tog-watchmoves: Gita embaju nana fayiro ezindiku tambuza, aha ebirikukuratirwa byangye.
tog-watchdeletion: Gita embaju nana fayiro ezinku sangura, aha Ebirikukuratirwa byangye
tog-watchcreations: Gita embaju ezindiku hangaho nana za fayiro ezi nku tekayo aha ''Ebirikukuratirwa''
tog-watchuploads: Gita fayiro ensya enzinku tekayo, aha Ebirikukuratirwa byangye
tog-watchrollback: Gita embaju ahinkozire oku Garuza, aha Ebirikukuratirwa byangye
